name: Randomizer Overide
description: This module allows designated users to select the random outcome value for a record when REDCap's built-in allocation-based randomization is in use. Essentially, you the user can bypass the normal randomization step and set the value to their choice.

project-settings.name:
Allowed Users List
Comma seperated list of [Userids] who are allowed to manually overide randomization fields

Enable Debug Logging
(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger
